entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chesterfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:16 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -39.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chesterfield Inlet Airport 07:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -39.1°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -57
Dewpoint: -43.3°C
Wind: WNW 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 37. Wind chill minus 61 this morning and minus 52 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 54 this evening and minus 63 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 38.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 38. Wind chill minus 63 in the morning and minus 54 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
